results.name: n + product of nonzero digits of n.
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
P. A. Loomis, An Interesting Family of Iterated Sequences
P. A. Loomis, An Introduction to Digit Product Sequences, J. Rec. Math., 32 (2003-2004), 147-151.
P. A. Loomis, An Introduction to Digit Product Sequences, J. Rec. Math., 32 (2003-2004), 147-151. [Annotated archived copy]
Index entries for Colombian or self numbers and related sequences
program: (ARIBAS): var stk: stack; end; for n := 1 to 80 do s := itoa(n); for j := 0 to length(s) -1 do k := atoi(s[j..j]); if k > 0 then stack_push(stk,k); end; end; write(n + product(stack2array(stk))," "); end;
(PARI) ProdNzD(x)= local(d,p); p=1; while (x>9, d=x-10*(x\10); if (d, p*=d); x\=10); return(p*x) } { for (n=1, 1000, write("b063114.txt", n, " ", n + ProdNzD(n)) ) \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 19 2009
a063114 n = n + a051801 n -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 15 2012
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Aug 08 2001
